verses.text: Unto \w the|strong="H3068"\w* end. \w A|strong="H5975"\w* psalm \w for|strong="H6256"\w* David.

\w In|strong="H6041"\w* \w the|strong="H8610"\w* Lord \w I|strong="H2098"\w* \w put|strong="H8610"\w* \w my|strong="H2803"\w* trust: \w how|strong="H2803"\w* then do \w you|strong="H2098"\w* say \w to|strong="H2803"\w* \w my|strong="H2803"\w* soul: Get thee away from hence \w to|strong="H2803"\w* \w the|strong="H8610"\w* mountain \w like|strong="H2803"\w* \w a|strong="H2803"\w* sparrow?

\w For|strong="H3588"\w*, lo, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* bent \w their|strong="H3068"\w* bow; \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* prepared \w their|strong="H3068"\w* arrows \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* quiver; \w to|strong="H5921"\w* shoot \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* dark \w the|strong="H5921"\w* upright \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3605"\w* \w they|strong="H0639"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H0369"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* which thou hast \w made|strong="H3605"\w*: \w but|strong="H0369"\w* what \w has|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w just|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H7563"\w* \w done|strong="H3605"\w*?

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H1870"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* holy temple, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lordâ€™s throne \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H1870"\w* \w heaven|strong="H4791"\w*. \w His|strong="H3605"\w* eyes look \w on|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* poor \w man|strong="H3605"\w*: \w his|strong="H3605"\w* eyelids examine \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sons \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0559"\w* Lord trieth \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w just|strong="H0834"\w* \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7451"\w*: \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* loveth iniquity hateth \w his|strong="H0834"\w* own soul.

\w He|strong="H6310"\w* \w shall|strong="H8478"\w* rain snares upon sinners: fire \w and|strong="H6310"\w* brimstone \w and|strong="H6310"\w* storms \w of|strong="H8478"\w* winds \w shall|strong="H8478"\w* be \w the|strong="H8478"\w* \w portion|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H8478"\w* \w their|strong="H4390"\w* cup.
\w For|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H2026"\w* Lord \w is|strong="H5869"\w* just, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* hath loved justice: \w his|strong="H2026"\w* countenance hath beheld righteousness.
